005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.DocumentFunctionException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public final class FnDoc {
028  // private static final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(FnDoc.class);
029
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
032      .name("doc")
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextDependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("arg1")
039          .type(IStringItem.class)
040          .zeroOrOne()
041          .build())
042      .returnType(IDocumentNodeItem.class)
043      .returnOne()
044      .functionHandler(FnDoc::execute)
045      .build();
046
047  private FnDoc() {
048    // disable construction
049  }
050
051  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
052  @NonNull
053  private static ISequence<IDocumentNodeItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
054      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
055      IItem focus) {
056    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
057
058    IStringItem item = arg.getFirstItem(true);
059
060    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(fnDoc(item, dynamicContext));
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Dynamically load the document associated with the URI, and return a
065   * {@link IDocumentNodeItem} containing the result.
066   * <p>
067   * Based on the XPath 3.1
068   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
069   * function.
070   *
071   * @param documentUri
072   *          the resource to load the data from
073   * @param context
074   *          the Metapath dynamic context
075   * @return the loaded document node item
076   */
077  public static IDocumentNodeItem fnDoc(@NonNull IStringItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
078    IAnyUriItem uri;
079    try {
080      uri = IAnyUriItem.cast(documentUri);
081    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
082      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT,
083          String.format("Invalid URI argument '%s' to fn:doc or fn:doc-available.", documentUri.asString()), ex);
084    }
085
086    return fnDoc(uri, context);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Dynamically load the document associated with the URI, and return a
091   * {@link IDocumentNodeItem} containing the result.
092   * <p>
093   * Based on the XPath 3.1
094   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
095   * function.
096   *
097   * @param documentUri
098   *          the resource to load the data from
099   * @param context
100   *          the Metapath dynamic context
101   * @return the loaded document node item
102   */
103  public static IDocumentNodeItem fnDoc(@NonNull IAnyUriItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
104    // resolve if possible
105    IAnyUriItem uri = FnResolveUri.fnResolveUri(documentUri, null, context);
106    if (!uri.isAbsolute() && !uri.isOpaque()) {
107      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
108          .format("No base-uri is available in the static context to resolve the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()));
109    }
110
111    try {
112      return context.getDocumentLoader().loadAsNodeItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(uri.asUri()));
113    } catch (IOException ex) {
114      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
115          .format("Unable to retrieve the resource identified by the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()), ex);
116    }
117  }
118}
